title: Sci-Fi Ambient Soundscapes Vol. 2
description: The second version from a collection of sci-fi ambient soundscapes, perfect for creating an oblivious, immersive and infinite atmosphere for your Sci-Fi, Space, Post Apocalyptic Game. Contains 100 different soundscapes with a total length of 150 minutes.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/sets/sci-fi-ambient-soundscapes-vol-2

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/qqndjzepz51otux/MSE%20-%20Sci-Fi%20Ambient%20Soundscapes%20Vol.%202.pdf?dl=0


The package contains 100 different ambient soundscapes with a total length of 150 minutes.


Use this asset to create the futuristic atmosphere of your universes, whether it's an endless space, an uncharted planet or natural satellite, an infected zone in a post-apocalyptic world or a lair of lost alien souls.


These ambient soundscapes work great as a background, they will help you tell a story, increase tension, fill the atmosphere in game scenes. They can also be used for the background in the menu. You can mix and match these soundscapes with each other to create extra variations.


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Â 100 ambient sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • perfect for animations, trailers, game scenes for post-apocalyptic, science fiction, fantasy, horror and more


Number of Audio Waves: 100

Number of Audio Cues: 100

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 149 minutes 52 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
